long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Handy popup for common ASCII/Unicode faces! Simply click the face to copy to the clipboard.

So very sorry for the name.

Completely clean. No permissions required. Full source available on GitHub!

- https://github.com/Fortyseven/TheGreenSmile
